title: Big Brother
overview: Housemates live under 24-hour surveillance as they attempt to avoid eviction from the Big Brother house with the most unpopular housemates facing a public vote. The iconic house has had a fresh lick of paint and is ready to welcome a brand-new cast of housemates from all walks of life as they take up residence in the Big Brother house, so join hosts AJ Odudu and Will Best for all of the action from their first week there!
